attributes.action: Invest in light rail schemes across the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Audit Commission told the government why the UK fails to implement Light Rail (modern trams), whilst schemes are expanding greatly on the continent.

Make it simpler to do, appropriate (less overbearing) safety, and public funding. UK Government just stopped developments for many towns. 

Buses can not provide the same trasfer of journeys from cars. All large towns and cities should be encouraged to review plans.

Information on worldwide light rail at http://www.lrta.org/
